concept.title: SMC PGI 5307.104 General Procedures

conbody.p: (c) For other than full and open competitive acquisitions, all acquisition strategy documents (e.g., Acquisition Plans, and Streamlined Acquisition Strategy Summaries above the SAT) should be coordinated with the Competition Advocate unless one of the exceptions at AFFARS 5307.104-92(b)(2) applies.
